biography.bio: Louise Monot was born on December 30, 1981 in Paris, France. She is an actress, known for OSS 117: Lost in Rio (2009), Un Amour à taire (2005) and Les petits mouchoirs (2010).
biography.name: Louise Monot

biography.bio: Mélanie Bernier was born on January 5, 1985 in Tours, France. She is an actress, known for La délicatesse (2011), Populaire (2012) and Un peu, beaucoup, aveuglément! (2015).
biography.name: Mélanie Bernier

biography.bio: Michaël Cohen was born on December 13, 1970 in Maisons-Lafitte, Yvelines, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Them (2006), Ça commence par la fin (2010) and La petite Jérusalem (2005).
biography.name: Michaël Cohen

biography.bio: Lionel Abelanski was born on October 22, 1964 in Paris, France. He is an actor and director, known for Atonement (2007), Train of Life (1998) and Le concert (2009).
biography.name: Lionel Abelanski

biography.bio: Anémone was born on August 9, 1950 in Paris, France as Anne Madeleine Louise Bourguignon. She is an actress and writer, known for Le père Noël est une ordure (1982), The Grand Highway (1987) and Peril (1985).
biography.name: Anémone

biography.bio: Thomas Suire is an actor, known for Pas de repos pour les braves (2003), Un Amour à taire (2005) and Le sens de l'orientation (2012).
biography.name: Thomas Suire

biography.bio: Salazar Fernandez is a spanish actor, director, writer, who lives in Belgium. He is specialised in french dubbing. Originally from Madrid, son of a Spanish father and an Italian mother, Salazar was born in Brussels on May 4 He spent part of his childhood between Spain and Sardinia before returning to settle permanently in the European capital. Passionate for theater from an early age, he set up for the first time on stage at the age of 9 years, where he plays the good guy Tiroflan in a Dierendonck Florian's theater play. He continues, until his teens, playing a few pieces, including "The Wizard of Oz" - where he will perform the iron man - or the play "Mr. Scrooge's Christmas Carol" in which he starred principal. These small theatrical experiences give him the desire to continue in that voice and will be a revelation to him. Studies in elementary education are exemplary but once in high school, things go wrong. Salazar did not like school, he was bored and then pass him leave school without really be interested. The results are felt. Nevertheless, he follows several privates trainings - including those of nutrition consultant, trainer and canine behaviorist - which will allow it to start very early in life. As a teenager, Salazar was forced to abandon his passion for theater. However, when his majority comes, he drops and starts school, head first, in his passion, living with the money he earns through his training. He left Madrid to train in the art of theater. In 2008, Salazar continues to train in Brussels with Boris Rabey, Anna Romano, Francesco Mormino, Kadi Abdelmalech, Cedric Juliens and Thierry Debroux. In late 2009, he took singing lessons to perfect her voice
biography.name: Salazar Fernandez

biography.bio: Catherine Ferran is an actress, known for Son frère (2003), Cyrano de Bergerac (1990) and Baxter (1989).
biography.name: Catherine Ferran

biography.bio: Corentin Lobet is an actor, known for Séraphine (2008), Days of Glory (2006) and The House by the Canal (2003).
biography.name: Corentin Lobet

biography.bio: Bernard Yerlès was born on January 17, 1961 in Etterbeek, Brussels, Belgium. He is an actor and producer, known for Mes amis, mes amours, mes emmerdes (2009), La vache et le président (2000) and Les duettistes: Une dette mortelle (1999).
biography.name: Bernard Yerlès
